text: Hi likasachan, you have to write {{ item.color_field.color }}
into your case may be you written {{ module.color_field }} or {{ module.color_field.color }}, so just correct with {{ item.color_field.color }}
Did you get your issue figured out?
no
<@U0275RK0R1P>, I have done the same too, but then also I was not able to change color in .html file.
Can you be specific on what you are trying to do and show me your setup maybe a screenshot.
And any errors you are getting.
Okay, so can you share your screen for few seconds?
Here is an example and some thoughts.

the new marketplace listing process looks really nice but I have ran into an issue formatting the text description. When I select text to make it a unordered list the autosave causes the text to unselect and jitter to the top. I am using chrome on a mac. Anyone else see this?
Hi Jacob! I'm Jackie, the designer on the Marketplace team. Thanks so much for your feedback! We're looking into this and will let you know as soon as we have a resolution :slightly_smiling_face:
Please let us know if you have any other feedback!
thank you I will.

the cli validation works nicely but do you know what this error means " [ERROR] Internal Error. Failed to fetch dependencies for modules/icon-text.module/module.html. Please try again" Is it possible to get more info on what the issue is
Hey Jacob - can you DM me your portal ID so I can take a look?
sure
does that mean a template was trying to reference a module and can't find it

Hmm typically that error means something went wrong on our end, but I'm looking at the requests made and they all returned 200 status responses, so it must be something in the CLI itself. Let me escalate this to the CLI dev team
ok thank you Mitchell nice job on all the new changes. Very impressive
Thank you! We all really appreciate that :smile:
I just validated my theme on the website not cli and it was validated there
In the preview there is no provider image. Is that something that appears when published or do I need to add that someplace?
Hey Jacob! You can add that in your Provider Profile
*Provider Info > Company Info > Company Avatar*
here I have taken color field and wrap it into a group.
I have to change value of color in .html file but this shows the warning

hey <@UTQQ4TXCH>
I have taken color field and wrapped it into a group in module
I have to change value of color in .html file for preview links but this shows warning.
